alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Decatur; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 1:13AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Henderson, southwestern Benton, Carroll and north central Decatur Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 113 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Atwood, or 7 miles southwest of McKenzie, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lexington, McKenzie, Huntingdon, Natchez Trace State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Bruceton, Atwood, Parkers Crossroads, Bargerton, Wildersville, Trezevant, Hollow Rock, Clarksburg, McLemoresville, Howley, Hillard, Dollar, Union Cross, Holladay and Leach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
